text: Folz is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Art Foltz (1903–1965), American football player *Hans Folz (c. 1437–1513), German author *Jean-Martin Folz (born 1947), French businessman *Richard E. Folz (1922–1973), American politician *Robert Folz (1910–1996), French medievalist
title: Folz
